## MarkerTechniqueParams.alwaysOnTop property

If `true`<!-- -->, the label will always be rendered on top. If overlapping with other labels with this flag set, the render order is undefined.  `false`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
alwaysOnTop?: boolean;
```
